remarks: Piecewise definition of a continuous function on a real interval. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jun-2014.)
statement:
cnmpt2pc.r $e |- R = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) $.
cnmpt2pc.m $e |- M = ( R |`t ( A [,] B ) ) $.
cnmpt2pc.n $e |- N = ( R |`t ( B [,] C ) ) $.
cnmpt2pc.o $e |- O = ( R |`t ( A [,] C ) ) $.
cnmpt2pc.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
cnmpt2pc.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
cnmpt2pc.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A [,] C ) ) $.
cnmpt2pc.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
cnmpt2pc.q $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = B /\ y e. X ) ) -> D = E ) $.
cnmpt2pc.d $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. ( A [,] B ) , y e. X |-> D ) e. ( ( M tX J ) Cn K ) ) $.
cnmpt2pc.e $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. ( B [,] C ) , y e. X |-> E ) e. ( ( N tX J ) Cn K ) ) $.
cnmpt2pc $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. ( A [,] C ) , y e. X |-> if ( x <_ B , D , E ) ) e. ( ( O tX J ) Cn K ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d ph x y $.
